"What about 'Frankensteinteen: become the monster?' That one's less 'don't be afraid of the monster.' It's 'become the monster.'

It's 2019: everything sucks. So, become the monster.

Get unironically into Electro Swing. Watch the 1986 film Ferris Bueller's Day Off four times in three days. Go back to school for some goddamn reason. Plan two separate trips to Europe for the same month.

Cut your hair short. Pet cats. Sleep in. Create a private twitter account and spend most of your time complaining on your public one.

Create things that aren't ever meant to be online. Draw terrible misshapen lines, for yourself. Write stories and don't show them to anyone. Pet more cats.

And update your goddamn personal website, because you've been meaning to do it forever and you're tired of paying a service 100 buckaroos every year for something you can do on your own.

It's 2019. Get ready.
